name: Mint Pass Tokyo AI Collection Purchase Option | Bright Moments | MPAIO

metadata.name: Mint Pass Tokyo AI Collection Purchase Option | Bright Moments | MPAIO
metadata.description: Mint Pass Tokyo AI Art Collection Option | MPAIO allows the holder the ability to purchase a Mint Pass AI Art Collection | MPAI for 75% of the sellout price of the Mint Pass in the AI Art Collection Auction on March 14 2023. The Artist ID on the MPAI Option will be the same as the Mint Pass MPAI. Please read the description of the Mint Pass MPAI to understand the terms of purchase. The Mint Pass Option must be redeemed at app.brightmoments.io by March 24 2023 at 12:00:00 pm Pacific Time. If the holder fails to redeem and purchase the Mint Pass MPAI by the deadline, the holder forfeits the claim to purchase the Mint Pass and the Options are burned. Bright Moments will then reassign the unclaimed Mint Pass MPAI Options. MPAI Options are transferable and redeemable by any wallet holding the MPAI Option at the time of the redeem.
